DOC.brief_summary: This is a questionnaire asking about the sleeve gastrectomy surgery and how has it altered food preferences before and after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Sleeve Gastrectomy on Food Preference
DOC.detailed_description: Participants that will undergo the sleeve gastrectomy surgery by Dr. Drake Bellanger's, will be asked to participant in a questionnaire survey. Once given the consent to participate, a food preference questionnaire (FPQ) will be administered at a pre-operative visit and then a six-week follow up visit at Dr. Drake Bellanger's office.
DOC.criteria: Male or Female, 18 years or over, who will undergo a sleeve gastrectomy for obesity by Dr. Drake Bellanger. Women who are pregnant or nursing.
